metadata.title: C&C Weapons: Renegade Edition
metadata.author: Chrono Vortex additional credit: Vertaalfout, R4V3-0N
metadata.description:
This mod adds several weapons from the Command and Conquer universe to Multiverse. This version requires version 5.0+ of the Tiberian Sun Ship Pack and version 3.0+ of Vertex Tags and Utility Functions. It must be patched after its dependencies, so the load order should look something like this:
| Multiverse | ... | Vertex Tags and Utility Functions | Tiberian Sun Ship Pack | C&C Weapons: Renegade Edition V ...
